details.description: Groups and categories for driving licences issued before 1997 - find equivalent new licence categories and what vehicles you can drive
details.body:
If your driving licence was issued before 1997 the ‘group’ or ‘category’ of your licence will have changed.

Driving licence categories changed in 1997. If your licence was issued before then, you can find the equivalent new category and check what types of vehicles you can drive.

Before June 1990 the types of vehicles you could drive were known as ‘groups’. These are now known as ‘categories’.

You can exchange your paper driving licence for a new photocard licence.

Licences issued between 1976 and 1986

Group Vehicles you can drive Driving licence category after 1997
A Car or light vehicle up to 3,500 kilograms (kg) Maximum Authorised Mass (MAM) B
A Medium-sized vehicle between 3,500 and 7,500kg MAM C1
A Vehicles between 3,500 and 7,500kg MAM with a trailer (combined weight no more than 8,250kg MAM) C1E (with restriction code 79 or 107)
A Minibus with 9 to 16 passenger seats (not driving for ‘hire or reward’) D1 (with restriction code 79 or 101)
A Vehicles in groups B, C, E, F, K, L and N below See below
B Group A vehicles (automatic only) Above categories (with restriction code 78)
C Any motor trike less than 410kg (500kg laden) B1 (excluding quad bikes)
D Motorbike A1 and A (depending on size of the motorbike)
E Moped up to 50cc (max speed 50km/h) P
J Invalid carriage (powered wheelchairs and mobility scooters) B1 (limited to invalid carriages)

Groups F, G, H, K, L, M, N keep the same category letters.

Licences issued between 1986 and June 1990

Group Vehicles you can drive Driving licence category after 1997
A Car or light vehicle up to 3,500kg MAM B
A Medium-sized vehicle between 3,500 and 7,500kg MAM C1
A Vehicles between 3,500 and 7,500kg MAM with a trailer (combined weight no more than 8,250kg MAM) C1E (with restriction code 79 or 107)
A Minibus with 9 to 16 passenger seats (not driving for ‘hire or reward’) D1 (with restriction code 79 or 101)
A Vehicles in groups B, C, E, F, K, L and N below See below
B Group A vehicles (automatic only) excluding automatic motor trikes Above categories (with restriction code 78 and excluding B1)
C Any motor trike less than 425kg B1 (excluding quad bikes)
D Motorbike A1 and A (depending on size of the motorbike)
E Moped up to 50cc (max speed 50km/h) P

Groups F, G, H, K, L, M, N keep the same category letters.

Licences issued between June 1990 and December 1996

Category Vehicles you can drive Driving licence category after 1997
A Motorbike with maximum speed of more than 50km/h or with engine over 50cc A1 and A (depending on size of bike)
B1 Motor trike with maximum speed of more than 50 km/h and less than 500kg B1 (excluding quad bikes)
B Vehicles not in category A up to 3,500kg MAM (and up to 8 passenger seats) B
C1 Medium-sized vehicle between 3,500 and 7,500kg MAM C1
C Large vehicle over 3,500kg MAM C
D1 Minibus (with between 9 and 16 passenger seats) D1
D Bus (with more than 8 passenger seats) D
E Vehicles in categories B, C and D with trailers BE, CE, DE
F Agricultural tractor F
G Road roller G
H Tracked vehicle H
K Mowing machine or pedestrian-controlled vehicle K
L Electrically-propelled vehicle L
P Moped up to 50cc (max speed 50km/h) P

N category vehicles (exempt from duty) keep the same category letter.

Larger vehicles on a separate licence

If you got your driving licence before June 1990 you may have had a separate licence that showed your entitlement to drive larger vehicles.

Group Vehicles you can drive Driving licence category after 1997
HGV 1 Vehicle over 3,500kg with a trailer over 750kg CE
HGV 2 or 3 Vehicle over 3,500kg with a trailer up to 750kg C
HGV 2 or 3 Vehicle over 3,500kg with a trailer over 750kg (draw-bar only) CE (with restriction code 79 or 102)
PSV 1 or 2 Passenger carrying vehicle (PCV) (more than 8 passenger seats) with a trailer over 750kg DE
PSV 3 PCV (more than 8 passenger seats) with a trailer up to 750kg D
PSV 4 PCV (more than 8 passenger seats) and less than 5.5 metres long D (with restriction code 79 or 105)
HGV 1-3A Automatic vehicles only in group HGV 1-3 C or CE (with restriction code 78)
PSV 1-4A Automatic vehicles only in group PSV 1-4 D or DE (with restriction code 78)
